For the last 51 years Yoido Full Gospel Church has developed the Holy Spirit Movement. We will continue to expand the Kingdom of God through the Cross-centered Spirit Movement and the message of the Fivefold Gospel and the Threefold Blessing.Furthermore, Yoido Full Gospel Church will be a role model to society and fulfill our mission which is to practice the service of Jesus Christ through the Movement of Sharing Love and Happiness and to preach the Gospel until the Lord comes again.
